select b1.zjqdid, b1.jklbh, b1.fjzch, b1.zjyy, b1.jkflbh, b3.ms, b1.bjyc, b1.bjyc_dw, case b1.jklbh when 'calendar' then b1.bjyc else b1.gdsx end gdsx, b1.gdsx_dw, (case b1.jklbh when 'calendar' then to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') when 'fuselage_flight_time' then (CASE WHEN b4.fxsj_xs_skj IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b4.fxsj_xs_skj END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b4.fxsj_fz_skj IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b4.fxsj_fz_skj END) when 'search_light_time' then (CASE WHEN b4.ssdsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b4.ssdsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b4.ssdsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b4.ssdsj_fz END) when 'winch_time' then (CASE WHEN b4.jcsj_xs IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b4.jcsj_xs END) || ':' || (CASE WHEN b4.jcsj_fz IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b4.jcsj_fz END) when 'landing_gear_cycle' then b4.qljxh_skj || '' when 'winch_cycle' then b4.jcxh || '' when 'ext_suspension_loop' then b4.dgxh || '' when 'special_first' then b4.ts1 || '' when 'special_second' then b4.ts2 || '' when 'N1' then b4.fdj_n1 || '' when 'N2' then b4.fdj_n2 || '' when 'N3' then b4.fdj_n3 || '' when 'N4' then b4.fdj_n4 || '' when 'N5' then b4.fdj_n5 || '' when 'N6' then b4.fdj_n6 || '' else '0' end) sj from b_s_00301 b1 join b_s_003 b2 on b1.zjqdid = b2.id and b2.zt = 1 and b2.sxzt = 1 and b2.kzlx in (1, 2)
and b1.zt = 1
join d_00601 b3 on b1.jkflbh = b3.jkflbh and b1.jklbh = b3.jklbh left join (select jh, xlh, dprtcode, sum(fxsj_xs) fxsj_xs, sum(fxsj_fz) fxsj_fz, sum(fxsj_xs_skj) fxsj_xs_skj, sum(fxsj_fz_skj) fxsj_fz_skj, sum(fsj_xs) fsj_xs, sum(fsj_fz) fsj_fz, sum(qljxh) qljxh, sum(qljxh_skj) qljxh_skj, sum(jcsj_xs) jcsj_xs, sum(jcsj_fz) jcsj_fz, sum(jcxh) jcxh, sum(fdj_n1) fdj_n1, sum(fdj_n2) fdj_n2, sum(fdj_n3) fdj_n3, sum(fdj_n4) fdj_n4, sum(fdj_n5) fdj_n5, sum(fdj_n6) fdj_n6, sum(ssdsj_xs) ssdsj_xs, sum(ssdsj_fz) ssdsj_fz, sum(dgxh) dgxh, sum(ts1) ts1, sum(ts2) ts2 from b_h_01001 where is_cyjs = 1 and zt = 1 and xdbs = 0 group by jh, xlh, dprtcode) b4 on b2.jh = b4.jh and b2.xlh = b4.xlh and b2.dprtcode = b4.dprtcode order by b3.pxh asc
